amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of the amendment contained in House Report 109-49 and numbered 7 which is printed on pages H2347-H2360 in the Congressional Record for April 20, 2005.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-49 to help lower gas prices, increase energy efficiency standards, and eliminate special interest subsidies and instead invest those resources in new technology with the idea of creating a better energy future.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 259 (Roll no. 118).
